name: @workspace/spa
description: Bulletproof react 19 SPA template with tanstack router
author: Tri Rizeki Rifandani

scripts.dev: rimraf dev-dist && cross-env DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa SW_DEV=true vite dev
scripts.dev:claims: rimraf dev-dist && cross-env DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa SW_DEV=true CLAIMS=true SW=true vite dev
scripts.dev:destroy: rimraf dev-dist && cross-env DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa SW_DEV=true SW_DESTROY=true vite dev
scripts.dev:claims-destroy: rimraf dev-dist && cross-env DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa SW_DEV=true CLAIMS=true SW_DESTROY=true SW=true vite dev
scripts.build: cross-env DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa BASE_URL=/ SOURCE_MAP=true npm run build-only
scripts.build:staging: cross-env DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa BASE_URL=/ SOURCE_MAP=true npm run build-only:staging
scripts.build:reloadsw: cross-env DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa BASE_URL=/ SOURCE_MAP=true RELOAD_SW=true npm run build-only
scripts.build:claims: cross-env DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa BASE_URL=/ SOURCE_MAP=true CLAIMS=true npm run build-only
scripts.build:reloadsw-claims: cross-env DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa BASE_URL=/ SOURCE_MAP=true RELOAD_SW=true CLAIMS=true npm run build-only
scripts.build:sw: rimraf dist && cross-env DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa BASE_URL=/ SOURCE_MAP=true SW=true npm run build-only
scripts.build:sw-reloadsw: cross-env DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa BASE_URL=/ SOURCE_MAP=true SW=true RELOAD_SW=true npm run build-only
scripts.build:sw-claims: cross-env DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa BASE_URL=/ SOURCE_MAP=true SW=true CLAIMS=true npm run build-only
scripts.build:sw-reloadsw-claims: cross-env DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa BASE_URL=/ SOURCE_MAP=true SW=true RELOAD_SW=true CLAIMS=true npm run build-only
scripts.build:destroy: cross-env DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa BASE_URL=/ SOURCE_MAP=true SW_DESTROY=true npm run build-only
scripts.build:reloadsw-destroy: cross-env DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa BASE_URL=/ SOURCE_MAP=true RELOAD_SW=true SW_DESTROY=true npm run build-only
scripts.build:claims-destroy: cross-env DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa BASE_URL=/ SOURCE_MAP=true CLAIMS=true SW_DESTROY=true npm run build-only
scripts.build:reloadsw-claims-destroy: cross-env DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa BASE_URL=/ SOURCE_MAP=true RELOAD_SW=true CLAIMS=true SW_DESTROY=true npm run build-only
scripts.build:sw-destroy: rimraf dist && cross-env DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa BASE_URL=/ SOURCE_MAP=true SW=true SW_DESTROY=true npm run build-only
scripts.build:sw-reloadsw-destroy: cross-env DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa BASE_URL=/ SOURCE_MAP=true SW=true RELOAD_SW=true SW_DESTROY=true npm run build-only
scripts.build:sw-claims-destroy: cross-env DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa BASE_URL=/ SOURCE_MAP=true SW=true CLAIMS=true SW_DESTROY=true npm run build-only
scripts.build:sw-reloadsw-claims-destroy: cross-env DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa BASE_URL=/ SOURCE_MAP=true SW=true RELOAD_SW=true CLAIMS=true SW_DESTROY=true npm run build-only
